Introduction
This topic contains information about controlling future examinations, including
types of future examination controls
establishing future examination control
in a rating decision
, and
without a rating decision
action when the control period for the future examination matures
, and
reviewing end products (EPs) 310 for permanency
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Control of Future Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
